DOC.brief_summary: The Hintegra® Total Ankle Prosthesis non constrain , three-component prosthesis consist flat tibial component , anatomically-shaped talar component , high-density polyethylene inlay . The Hintegra ankle specifically develop attempt address need minimal bone resection , extend bone support , proper ligament balancing , minimal contact stress within around prosthesis . The objective study evaluate safety efficacy HINTEGRA® Total Ankle prosthesis short mid term follow .
